summary: 1ST DATE OF TRANSMISSION REPLACEMENT WAS IN APRIL 1999.  STUCK IN SECOND GEAR.  STILL UNDER WARRANTLY, STILL HAD TO PAY DEDUCTIBLE.  MILEAGE WAS 35,000.  NOW 2ND TRANSMISSION REPLACEMENT AT 96,000 STRANDED ON THE FREEWAY WITH MY CHILDREN IN THE CAR.  TRANSMISSION STUCK AND LEAKING FLUID. WAS NOT DRIVEABLE. FOR A WOPPING COST OF $2700.00
